questions.question: 3. Transmission gate is preferred over Complementary CMOS logic because ____

answers.a: Transistor count required to implement a logic function in transmission gate is low

explanations.a: Incorrect. Low transistor count alone is not the only reason transmission gates are preferred; low delay is also important.
explanations.b: Incorrect. Low delay alone is not the only reason transmission gates are preferred; low transistor count is also important.
explanations.c: Correct. Transmission gates are preferred over complementary CMOS logic because they have lower transistor count and low delay.
explanations.d: Incorrect. One of the above options is correct, not none.

questions.question: 4. How many 2x1 multiplexer will be require to design 8x1 multiplexer?

explanations.a: Incorrect. Three 2x1 multiplexers are not sufficient to design an 8x1 multiplexer.
explanations.b: Correct. Seven 2x1 multiplexers are required to design an 8x1 multiplexer using cascading.
explanations.c: Incorrect. Four 2x1 multiplexers are not sufficient for an 8x1 multiplexer.
explanations.d: Incorrect. Eight 2x1 multiplexers are not required; fewer can achieve the same functionality.
